strategy: Dark Mechanicus armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All Battle Titan and Chaos Warhound formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army from the Traitor Titan Legions with Dark Mechanicus support.

sections.name: Battle Titan Formations
sections.description: Army may not mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: 0-1 Chaos Emperor Titan
formations.units: Daemonic Locus, one Vicebringer Titan of Slaanesh / Gloombringer Titan of Nurgle / Strifebringer Titan of Khorne / Changebringer Titan of Tzeentch

formations.name: Chaos Warlord Titan
formations.units: Daemonic Locus, one Painlord Titan of Slaanesh / Plaguelord Titan of Nurgle / Banelord Titan of Khorne / Warplord Titan of Tzeentch

formations.name: Chaos Reaver Titan
formations.units: Daemonic Locus, one Reviler Titan of Slaanesh / Repugnant Titan of Nurgle / Ravager Titan of Khorne / Mutator Titan of Tzeentch

sections.name: Scout Titan Formations
sections.description: Up to three for each Battle Titan. Army may not mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: Chaos Warhound
formations.units: Daemonic Locus, one Plaguehound of Nurgle / Bloodhound of Khorne / Warphound of Tzeentch / Chaos Warhound of Chaos Undivided

formations.name: Slaanesh Scout Titan
formations.units: Daemonic Locus, one Subjugator of Slaanesh / Questor of Slaanesh

sections.name: Daemon Engine Formations
sections.description: Up to three for each Battle Titan. Army may not mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: Chaos Knight
formations.units: Daemonic Locus, one Hell-Scourge of Slaanesh / Hell-Knight of Slaanesh / Knight-Desecrator of Nurgle / Knight-Rampager of Khorne / Knight-Despoiler of Tzeentch / Knight-Renegade of Chaos Undivided

formations.name: Defiler Pack
formations.units: Three Debasers of Slaanesh / Slaughterfiends of Khorne / Defilers of Chaos Undivided
extraUnits: Replace three Debasers / Slaughterfiends / Defilers with three Desecrators of Nurgle, or three Decievers of Tzeentch: 25 points
Add one Debaser / Slaughterfiend / Desecrator / Deciever / Defiler (formation may not mix different types of units): 50 points

sections.name: Hell-Forge and Chaos Navy Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points. Add three points to the Lesser Daemon Pool for each Eye of the Gods / Daemonic Herald upgrade, and add one point for each Daemonic Locus character.

upgrades.title: Traitor Titan Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: 0-1 Eye of the Gods
items.description: Replace the Daemonic Locus with a Eye of the Gods character

items.name: Daemonic Herald
items.description: Replace the Daemonic Locus with a Daemonic Herald character. May not be combined with Eye of the Gods
